name: Cosmic Sizzle
description:
Combine essential oils with unique burners that will bring out beautiful and mesmerizing particles and effects. Surrounded by a forest and in dawn and moonlight you will be calmly and peacefully immersed in the experience of discovering possibilities.

We hope you find calmness and a relaxed space with this experience

Credits:

  • Jorge Aranda: Sound, Production, Design, Programming
  • Silvia Osoro: Lead Programmer
  • Bruno Pérez: 3D Art, Design
  • Alvaro Marco: Programming, Design
